verbs.description: With President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence ’s visit to the NRA convention in Dallas over , most of the attention [V: is] now turning to outside of the convention .

[ARGM-ADV: With President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence ’s visit to the NRA convention in Dallas over] , [ARG1: most of the attention] is [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: turning] [ARGM-DIR: to outside of the convention] .
